Description: The UK economy is 'headed for the worst of all worlds' as businesses expect activity to fall at the start of next year, according to the Confederation of British Industry (CBI).

Title: It's a smash and grab raid on the constitution': The last of the hereditary peers
Description: For centuries an odd tradition lay dormant in our democracy.

Title: At least 10 killed as small plane crashes in popular Brazilian tourist town
Description: A small plane has crashed into a popular Brazilian tourist town, killing all 10 people on board, according to officials.

Title: Grief, anger and fear in Magdeburg as authorities seek answers on Christmas market attack suspect
Description: After the carnage at the Magdeburg Christmas market, there are now questions about whether something was missed.

Title: Christmas market attack suspect threatened act to 'attract international attention' in 2013
Description: The suspect in the German Christmas market attack 'threatened to do something that would attract international attention' in 2013 and was flagged as a potential threat the following year, according to a state interior minister.

Title: Nine-year-old boy killed in German Christmas market attack named
Description: The mother of a nine-year-old boy killed in the German Christmas market attack has paid tribute to 'my little teddy bear'.

Title: At least 67 dead in Nigeria after deadly stampedes within days of each other
Description: Police in Nigeria say at least 67 people have died after three stampedes within days of each other.

Title: No 'immediate' plans to ban Musk giving Farage's Reform UK large donations - government
Description: There are no 'immediate' plans to stop Elon Musk donating large sums of money to Nigel Farage's Reform UK, according to the government.

Title: Trump White House will be like '24/7 bar-room brawl', warns former ambassador to US
Description: Donald Trump's second stint as president will be like a '24/7 bar-room brawl', according to the UK's former ambassador to Washington.

Title: Labour's polling collapse is historic - but Nigel Farage has overseen a bigger one
Description: Labour are on track for their worst end to the year in opinion polls since the Second World War.

Title: US military mistakenly shoots down one of its fighter jets
Description: A US fighter jet has been shot down after it was mistakenly hit by an American missile cruiser over the Red Sea.

Title: Grandmother, 80, 'fell to her knees' after IDF shot her six times during raid, says son
Description: As we stare at a bullet-ridden wall, two young Palestinian boys stand behind us on a stoop and look on in fearful awe.

Title: Albania to ban TikTok for a year as country's PM claims app inciting violence and bullying
Description: The Albanian government plans to block access to TikTok for a year after the killing of a 14-year-old boy led to concerns about social media's influence on children.

Title: Germany stands in dark hours with Magdeburg': Memorial service held for Christmas market attack victims
Description: A memorial service has taken place in Magdeburg, Germany, for the victims of a Christmas market attack.
